intro.name: Oscar Pang
intro.title: Computer Science Student @ University of Toronto
intro.bio: Chinese, 19 years old, 2nd year Univeristy, Introvert.; Immigrated from China to Canada in 2014 with my family.; Started Coding during middle school at a bootcamp.; Ultimate goal for the future is to make it into Big Tech and not get laid off lol.; Passionate about machine learning, full-stack development, and solving real-world problems through innovation.
